title: Follow me to freedom
author: VD
content_html: I just turned in next Monday’s column, a passionate screed on OS migration. I considered holding off on it until the column was running in the Dallas Morning News, but then I decided that it was perhaps a bit too technophilic for the poor unsuspecting readers of the Dallas editorial page. At least WND’s readers are used to me and my idiosyncracies by now.
content_text: I just turned in next Monday’s column, a passionate screed on OS migration.  I considered holding off on it until the column was running in the Dallas Morning News, but then I decided that it was perhaps a bit too technophilic for the poor unsuspecting readers of the Dallas editorial page.  At least WND’s readers are used to me and my idiosyncracies by now.
